Description: Primary key identifier for the hub

Sample Values: Central coordination hub for Paraguay operations implementing the Poverty Stoplight methodology

Description: Indicates if the hub is currently active

Data Quality Checks: Valid Unix timestamp, Not in future
NOT NULL, Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.organizations

Description: Country where the hub is located
Data Quality Checks: ISO country code format, Length check (2)
URL format check, Image domain validation

Description: Contact phone number for the hub
Data Quality Checks: Phone number format check, Length check (max 50)

Description: Latitude coordinate of the hub's location
Longitude coordinate of the hub's location
User who last modified the record
Timestamp when the record was created

Data Quality Checks: Valid timestamp, Not in future, >= created_date

Description: Reference to the parent hub (if any)
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.applications
